description: This file defines a service class `LLMService` that abstracts over different large language model (LLM) providers. It supports a mock mode for testing purposes, generating test cases and scripts, or it can be extended to interface with real providers like OpenAI.

classes.name: LLMService
classes.description: Provides an abstraction over LLM providers, offering methods to generate test cases and scripts, with support for mock mode or real provider integration.

methods.name: List[Dict[str,Any]] generate_test_cases(self, srs_title: str, srs_content: str)
methods.description: Generates a list of structured test cases based on SRS content, returning mock data if in mock mode or when the provider is 'mock'.

methods.name: str generate_script(self, test_case: Dict[str, Any])
methods.description: Creates a test script (e.g., using pytest and Playwright) corresponding to a given test case, returning mock scripts if in mock mode.

ctags.name: generate_script
ctags.pattern: /^    def generate_script(self, test_case: Dict[str, Any]) -> str:$/

ctags.name: generate_test_cases
ctags.pattern: /^    def generate_test_cases(self, srs_title: str, srs_content: str) -> List[Dict[str, Any]]:$/
